abstract: The New York Times asked the actress Donna Lynne Champlin, who is also a new mother, to be a guest blogger as she rehearsed for "Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice, a Musical," part of the New York Musical Theater Festival.
snippet: The New York Times asked the actress Donna Lynne Champlin, who is also a new mother, to be a guest blogger as she rehearsed for "Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice, a Musical," part of the New York Musical Theater Festival.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times asked the actress Donna Lynne Champlin, who is also a new mother, to be a guest blogger as she rehearsed for "Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice, a Musical," part of the New York Musical Theater Festival. In this final installment, she describes the days before opening. A review of the show appears here.

headline.main: Musicals Festival Diary: Firsts for Everything and an Opening to Remember
